title: Aggregated features & LightGBM
description: In this kernel we will take a look at engineering aggregated features. Specifically, we will engineer 3 aggregated features using train_active.csv, test_active.csv, periods_test.csv and periods_test.csv. Those features will be:  avg_times_up_user - how often the average item of the user has been put up for sale. avg_days_up_user - the average number of days an item from the user has been put up for sale. n_user_items - the number of items the user has put up for sale.  Let's see if they help :)
